duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish Data Governance, Data Catalog, and Data Quality platforms and processes, with a focus on Azure Purview and other Data Catalog tools.
Evaluate Data Governance, Catalog, and Data Quality Tools/Framework options based on business needs and requirements.
Provide high-level compatibility and comparison of options, as well as architecture options comparison and compatibility matrix.
Complete detailed Data Governance Architecture Design and Process flows of selected Architecture based on needs and requirements.
Identify key attributes required by source for implementing Data Quality Rules.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
